Primary Contact: Liza Rozen-Delman, Camp Director; Phone: 604-263-0884; Email: liza@camphatikvah.com
Service Details: - Offers a camp for children with a schedule of culture, athletics and arts within a Jewish and Zionist atmosphere - Provides a well-rounded summer experience with a balanced emphasis on skill development and relationship building - Campers are immersed in a group setting where they must learn to live, cooperate with, and embrace one another so they learn both about themselves and what it means to be a member of a community
